title: Rule Type Available Attributes
content:

Rule Type Available Attributes

 

  • Rule Type Available Attributes
    • Filters
    • Creating a Rule Type Available Attributes
    • Deleting Rule Type Available Attributes
      • Field Description
      • Action Buttons

The rule type available attributes UI lists the available attributes by rule type for a given component. The available attributes can be mapped to the rule type from this UI. Unlike the available attributes UI, this UI does not require a user to be a system admin.

In this UI, the user can delete the available attributes. User can also create new rule available attributes by specifying rule type, entity, and attribute.

 

Filters

The rule type available attributes filters are:

1) Rule Type Id

2) Entity Id

3) Attribute Id

 

Creating a Rule Type Available Attributes

To create a new rule type for an available attribute:

Select the allocation component name from the filter panel.

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Common > Rule Type Available Attributes
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Click Create to view the Rule Type Available Attribute window.
  4. Select the Rule Type Id of an attribute from the drop-down list. The available options are Allocation Policy (item entity) and Auto Submit Approval Criteria (supply entity).
  5. Select the Entity Id of an attribute from the drop-down list.
  6. Select the Attribute Id of an attribute from the drop-own list.
  7. Click Save.

Deleting Rule Type Available Attributes

The available attribute records can be deleted by following one of the below procedures:

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Common > Rule Type Available Attributes
  2. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'This action will delete selected Rule Type Available Attribute'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the rule type available attribute.

Delete

  1. Select the required record card. The footer section with action buttons is displayed.
  2. Select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'This action will delete selected Rule Type Available Attribute'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the rule type available attribute.
Field Description

Following are the field descriptions of the rule type attributes available on the screen.

 

Field

 Description
Rule Type Id  The rule type id of an available attribute.
Entity Id The source entity to which the attribute ID belongs.
Attribute Id The name of the rule type of attribute.

 

Action Buttons

Following are the action buttons available on the screen.

 

Select All Rows Selects all the rows of records on the screen.
Export Exports the list of available attributes, and the file will be downloaded onto your system. View Export for more information.
Create Opens the Rule Type Available Attribute window. 
Deselect Clears the selected records.
Delete Deletes the selected record.
